docs.snippet: A young white man suspected of shooting nine black people dead after spending an hour with them in Bible study at a historic African-American church in South Carolina was arrested on Thursday, a day after a massacre authorities say was motivated b...
docs.lead_paragraph: A young white man suspected of shooting nine black people dead after spending an hour with them in Bible study at a historic African-American church in South Carolina was arrested on Thursday, a day after a massacre authorities say was motivated by racial hatred.

headline.main: White Man Arrested in Slaying of Nine Blacks at South Carolina Church
headline.print_headline: White Man Arrested in Slaying of Nine Blacks at South Carolina Church

docs.snippet: The attack occurred at a historic church near downtown Charleston, S.C., and the police were seeking the gunman, whom they described as white....
docs.lead_paragraph: The attack occurred at a historic church near downtown Charleston, S.C., and the police were seeking the gunman, whom they described as white.
docs.abstract: White gunman opens fire at Emanuel AME Church in Charleston, SC, home to one of America's oldest black congregations; police release no information about possible victims, but are calling shooting a hate crime.

headline.main: Nine Killed in Shooting at Black Church in Charleston
headline.print_headline: South Carolina Police Search for Shooter at Black Church

byline.contributor: Jason Horowitz and Nick Corasaniti reported from Charleston, and Ashley Southall from New York.
byline.original: By JASON HOROWITZ, NICK CORASANITI and ASHLEY SOUTHALL

docs.snippet: Liberia's soccer chief launched a bid on Thursday to succeed Sepp Blatter, pledging to eradicate corruption and ensure fans trust FIFA again by being a unifying leader who stops power being concentrated at the top....
docs.lead_paragraph: Liberia's soccer chief launched a bid on Thursday to succeed Sepp Blatter, pledging to eradicate corruption and ensure fans trust FIFA again by being a unifying leader who stops power being concentrated at the top.

headline.main: Liberia Soccer Chief Announces Run for FIFA Presidency
headline.print_headline: Liberia Soccer Chief Announces Run for FIFA Presidency
